title: Multifocal and multisystemic (disseminated) Langerhans-cell histiocytosis [Letterer-Siwe disease]
block: Malignant neoplasms, stated or presumed to be primary, of lymphoid, haematopoietic and related tissue
category: Other and unspecified malignant neoplasms of lymphoid, haematopoietic and related tissue
exclusion: secondary and unspecified neoplasm of lymph nodes
